name: Business Variable Construction
description: If you're planning a building or construction project for your new or expanding business, with our Business Variable Construction Loan you can enjoy the benefits of interest only repayments and withdraw your funds gradually over a period of 12 months while you build.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible repayment frequency - pay weekly, fortnightly or monthly / monthly for Interest Only
Free up extra cash by paying only the interest portion of the loan for up to five years, then reverts to P&I

With our Construction Loan option you can withdraw your funds gradually over a period of 12 months while you build so you only pay interest on the portion of the loan you have drawn; keeping your money in your pocket for longer

fees.name: Business Loan Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Application Fee of $600 for loans up to $80,000 or 0.75% of loan for loans greater than $80,000

fees.name: Security Handling Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per occurrence. Payable in the following circumstances; deed of priority, title production, variation of priority, consent or name change.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: For the preparation of a discharge of mortgage.

fees.name: Progress Draw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable per property when a loan will be drawn progressively for either construction or major renovation purposes. The fee includes the cost of all progress draws and the final inspection.

fees.name: Documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the following circumstances: preparation of an additional mortgage; preparation of a guarantee; or where documents have been cancelled or redone, at your request, after contracts have been issued.

tiers.name: Business Loan
tiers.additionalInfo: Loan to Value Ratio (LVR) up to 80%

lendingRates.additionalValue: Secured by Residential Property up to $1,000,000
